name: rss-bridge
description: RSS-Bridge is a self-hosted feed generator that fetches content from webpages and delivers custom RSS/Atom feeds. It supports dozens of sites and simplifies subscription management.

features.title: Feed Generation
features.description: Create RSS feeds from websites that don't offer them natively

features.title: Tagging System
features.description: Use ready-made scrapers for popular sites like Twitter, Instagram, and YouTube

features.title: Custom Bridges
features.description: Write your own bridges to generate feeds from any website

features.title: Multiple Formats
features.description: Output feeds in RSS, Atom, JSON, or HTML formats

features.title: Parameter Support
features.description: Customize feed generation with URL parameters for filtering

features.title: Caching
features.description: Store generated feeds temporarily to reduce server load and improve speed

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Browse available bridges and generate feeds through a simple UI

features.title: REST API
features.description: Generate feeds programmatically for automation or integration
